# Setup

This is the introductory page to some of the initial survey results. 

```{r setup, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
# bookdown::render_book('index.Rmd', 'bookdown::gitbook')

rm(list=ls())

library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)
library(tidyverse)
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)
library(showtext)

## Automatically use showtext to render text for future devices
showtext_auto()

## Global options
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE,
	             cache=TRUE,
               prompt=FALSE,
               tidy=TRUE,
               comment=NA,
               message=FALSE,
               warning=FALSE,
               fig.width = 6,
               fig.asp = 0.8,
               fig.showtext=TRUE,
               out.width = "80%")
opts_knit$set(width=75)

```

```{r input}

data <- read_csv("Data/Raw/Tunisia_Processed.csv") %>% 
  mutate(across(islamist_v19:democrat_v24, as.factor)) %>% 
  mutate(across(antiAmerican_v26:islamist_v15, as.factor))

```
